revised_title: High-Pressure and High-Temperature Research: Advancements in Temperature Measurement and Melting Determination in the Laser-Heated Diamond-Anvil Cell
tldr: This article discusses the challenges and advancements in measuring temperature and determining melting points in the laser-heated diamond-anvil cell. The authors focus on the development of simultaneous high-pressure and temperature measurements and review practical aspects of the technique. They present results for the melting of argon and iron and the relative positions of their melting curves.
